pr_title: Use new roll dice, select casualties, and remove casualties steps

timeline.message:
Use new roll dice, select casualties, and remove casualties steps

The Fire and FireAa classes are no longer used in building the 3 fire
sub steps.

The AirVsNonSubs step is removed because that firing group is now named
and will be displayed in the battle ui when it fires, selects, and
removes.

timeline.bodyText: This method was moved from MustFightBattle without any changes.
